===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|なまぐさ}}
Root stem of adjective {{m|ja|生臭い}}, {{m|ja|腥い|tr=namagusai||smelling of fish, meat, or blood; stinky, bad-smelling}},<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> itself a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=なまぐさ|生|tr1=nama|t1=raw, uncooked|臭い|tr2=kusa|t2=stink, bad smell|pos2=root stem of {{m|ja|臭い}} ''kusai'', “stinky, bad-smelling”}}.  {{rendaku2|sort=なまぐさ|kusa|gusa}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|なまぐさ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

# a {{l|en|stink}}, a bad {{l|en|smell}}
